item.title: Downloads
item.description: Downloads # Current Release # Current release of BackSlash Linux is BackSlash Linux Kristoff, which was released on December 25, 2018. Please click the button below to download it. Download BackSlash Linux Kristoff Archives # You can download previous releases of BackSlash Linux in the archives section. All downloads are available in the ‘files’ tab of the sourceforge repository of BackSlash Linux. Access Archives
